name: Bob on Crates 2D
description:
Bob standing on crates, and he want to get down to the ground. 

Destroy the crates to make him land on the ground, avoid him to fall off the level.

-actually fun gameplay, but I already did this game in 3D

- 20 levels

- save and load-function

- generic AI-created backgroundmusic and royaltyfree stolen music from da web

- halfass pixelart with diffrent pixelsize combain unconsistic fontstyle

- made in unity with playmaker
